solution.linktext: Explore how you can utilize the extended capabilities of Microsoft Dynamics 365 in your customer’s environment.
Using Technical Presales Assistance and partner advisory hours

community.linktext: Get help from the Microsoft Partner Support Community
Read the Partner Technical Services blog
Subscribe to the MPN Partner Support YouTube Channel

level.title: Submit a request online
level.description: Submit the details of your request online, and a Microsoft partner consultant will contact you with customized guidance to meet your business needs.
